title: Is it possible to buy RP in US rates when I live in Canada?
body: I have the money in my Paypal, but is it possible to buy RP in US rates?

replies.body:
You may be able to if you change your payment options country in the RP purchase window. Since you're not in the US, I can't guarantee it will work 100%, but you can certainly give it a shot.

Let me know if you have any questions.
